评论详情: Stylish frames , could be a little more sturdy but over all good value for the money. Very classy and clean looking

-This retro oval sunglasses is nice and trendy. -It is relatively lightweight and feels comfortable on. -I ordered the silver frame with grey lens and the silver is a little too shiny for my liking but if you like the look, go ahead. -The material appears decent, it is not flimsy and it should not break easily. -I have a fairly large face and this glasses fit me snug. -Overall, this sunglasses is decent for the price.

These sunglasses are super cute.  I like things that are different and these have a great retro shape and metal rims.  I chose the black and grey color.  They go with anything I wear and I've already had lots of compliments.  They are very light and comfortable  to wear and they come with a pouch, a cleaning cloth and a key chain screw driver so you'll always be ready if you need to tighten one of the screws. These glasses also are said to block 100% of UVA and UVB rays so they do a great job protecting my eyes.  They come in lots of color combos so I may just order a few more.

评论概述: So chic and I love it
评论详情: I was not expected that this sunglass would be this perfect. It arrived in a nice box that includes of small key chain screws that you can use if at anytime any of the screws are loose and you need to tight them. The sunglass is so chic and it looks so luxury in person. I think it's definitely worth it specially that it's so light and you can have it on for hours and it doesn't leave any marks or spots on your nose/face.

These Breaksun Retro Oval Sunglasses look like they are a throwback to the late 90's or early 2000's to me. They seem well-made in general. I'm not sure how well or long they will hold up, depends on whether the frame was simply painted black or not. It is hard to tell at this point. They are fairly cute "on." (and I'm pretty picky about sunglasses on me.) The lenses are very dark/black, so no one can really see your eyes through these, but you can see fine looking out through them though (not distractingly dark to peer through...) The lenses are clear to look through (meaning not foggy looking, seem like a good lens). The nose pads sit evenly on my nose bridge. (I always worry about that with sunglasses with nose pads to them.)  I think these sunglasses are cute in person, and I would get them again, but I think next time would opt for this same style sunglasses, but I might try the silver frame rather than the completely black ones.  Both are cool looking though. Can't go wrong! Note: These come with a little storage bag and a key chain glasses screwdriver, which is a nice "extra" for tightening up  the screws in your frame as needed.

评论概述: Relive the 90s! [Breaksun’s Retro Oval Sunglasses in Black/Gray]
评论详情: Breaksun’s Retro Oval Sunglasses in Black/Gray are a very nice fit for those with a flatter bridge (aka “Asian fit”).  They fit snugly on my medium sized head, but since there isn’t an expandable hinge at the temples, those with larger heads will want to pass.  Construction is decent and this is valued fairly at $14.99.  This pair really does remind me of my old 90s glasses.  Comes with a cleaning cloth, eyeglass screwdriver, and a bag for storage.

These shades are super cute and lightweight. They came with cleaning cloth, carrying pouch, and little screwdriver keychain which are all very convenient. I like how it fits and the small size makes it easy to carry around. I would recommend these sunglasses.

I love the style of these oval sunglasses! They are a much different shape than I normally go for and I was pleasantly surprised with them. The quality is great and overall thy are a nice change to my normal everyday sunglasses! They will be a cute accessory to have in my collection.
